elements.name: question1
elements.title: Why can it be useful to draw up a budget?
elements.correctAnswer: Better overview of finances; balance income and expenditure and make savings; reduced risk of debt; protection against financial surprises; targeted savings

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are variable costs?
elements.correctAnswer: Variable costs are expenses that are not incurred regularly or are not the same every month. They are dependent on consumption.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What are fixed costs?
elements.correctAnswer: Fixed costs are monthly recurring expenses for a fixed amount or an amount within a certain range (monthly average): Insurance, subscriptions, rent, taxes, etc.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Where can you get answers to questions about your budget?
elements.correctAnswer: For example, at www.budgetberatung.ch or www.heschnocash.ch. The "BudgetCH" app from the umbrella organization Budgetberatung Schweiz also provides a practical tool for drawing up a budget.
